Bash(powershell.exe -File - <<'EOF'
$path = 'C:\\Users\\adubr\\source\\repos\\Disctalk\\Disctalk\\Program.cs'
$lines = [System.IO.File]::ReadAllLines\($path\)

# Step 1: Remove model classes block \(indices 1871-2626\)
$newLines = [System.Collections.Generic.List[string]]::new\($lines\)
$newLines.RemoveRange\(1871, 2626 - 1871 + 1\)

# Step 2: Remove wordCount class \(indices 711-721, blank+class\)
$newLines.RemoveRange\(711, 721 - 711 + 1\)

# Step 3: Add "using Disctalk.Models;" after the last using line
# Find the index of "using System.Runtime.CompilerServices;"
$insertIdx = -1
for \($i = 0; $i -lt $newLines.Count; $i++\) {
    if \($newLines[$i] -match '^using '\) {
        $insertIdx = $i
    }
}
Write-Host "Last using line index: $insertIdx, content: '$\($newLines[$insertIdx]\)'"
$newLines.Insert\($insertIdx + 1, 'using Disctalk.Models;'\)

# Write back
[System.IO.File]::WriteAllLines\($path, $newLines, [System.Text.UTF8Encoding]::new\($true\)\)
Write-Host "Done. New line count: $\($newLines.Count\)"
EOF)
